subject: The Future of AI: What 2025 Has in Store

body.text:
Tech Insights Weekly

The Future of AI: What 2025 Has in Store

By Sarah Chen | January 15, 2025 | 8 min read

Hey there,

Welcome back to Tech Insights Weekly! This week, we're diving deep into the AI trends shaping 2025.

Key Highlights:

1. Multimodal AI Goes Mainstream
OpenAI's GPT-5 and Google's Gemini Ultra are pushing boundaries with unprecedented multimodal capabilities.

2. AI Regulation Heats Up
The EU AI Act takes effect next month, setting a global precedent for AI governance.

3. Edge AI Revolution
On-device AI is no longer science fiction - it's becoming standard in smartphones and IoT devices.

Read the full article:
https://techinsights.substack.com/p/future-of-ai-2025

What I'm Reading:
- "The Coming Wave" by Mustafa Suleyman
- MIT Technology Review's AI special issue
- Stanford's 2025 AI Index Report

Next Week:
I'll be covering the latest developments in quantum computing and what it means for cryptography.

Thanks for reading! If you enjoyed this, please share it with a friend.

- Sarah

---

Tech Insights Weekly
Delivering cutting-edge technology analysis since 2020
